amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to terminate certain deductions from mineral revenue payments made to States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4214 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4214 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Enzi. (consideration: CR S2064-2067; text: CR S2064) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to terminate certain deductions from mineral revenue payments made to States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4214 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4214 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Enzi.
